TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ForeignKeyConstraint extends System.Data.Constraint

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("Microsoft.VSDesigner.Data.Design.ForeignKeyConstraintEditor, Microsoft.VSDesigner, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: Represents an action restriction enforced on a set of columns in a primary key/foreign key relationship when a value or row is either deleted or updated.

span.span: Represents an action restriction enforced on a set of columns in a primary key/foreign key relationship when a value or row is either deleted or updated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个限制时删除或更新某一列 （或列） 中的值执行的操作。A restricts the action performed when a value in a column (or columns) is either deleted or updated. 此类约束旨在与主键列一起使用。Such a constraint is intended to be used with primary key columns. 在父/子关系中两个表之间，删除一个值从父表可能会影响子行中通过以下方式之一。In a parent/child relationship between two tables, deleting a value from the parent table can affect the child rows in one of the following ways. - 也可以是行的子删除 （级联操作）。The child rows can also be deleted (a cascading action). - 中的子列 （或列） 的值可以设置为 null 值。The values in the child column (or columns) can be set to null values. - 中的子列 （或列） 的值可以设置为默认值。The values in the child column (or columns) can be set to default values. - 可以生成异常。An exception can be generated. 对象包含在的，这通过访问属性。 objects are contained in the of a , which is accessed through the property. 约束不会强制执行，除非属性设置为`true`。Constraints are not enforced unless the property is set to `true`. 强制实施每当对象的调用方法。The is enforced whenever a object's method is invoked. ## Examples 下面的示例创建，设置的某些属性，并将其添加到对象的。The following example creates a , sets some of its properties, and adds it to a object's . [!code-vb[Classic WebData ForeignKeyConstraint Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData ForeignKeyConstraint Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 此类型是安全的多线程读取操作。

span.span: This type is safe for multithreaded read operations.

threadsafe.span: 你必须同步的任何写入操作。

span.span: You must synchronize any write operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将更改为或不是最后直到`AcceptChanges`调用方法。Changes to a or are not final until the `AcceptChanges` method is invoked. 此时，确定的操作的已更改或删除任何值。At that point, the determines the course of action on any values that have been changed or deleted. ## Examples 下面的示例创建，设置其，并将添加到约束对象的。The following example creates a , sets its , and adds the constraint to a object's . [!code-vb[Classic WebData ForeignKeyConstraint.DeleteRule Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData ForeignKeyConstraint.DeleteRule Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the action that occurs across this constraint when a row is deleted.

span.span: Gets or sets the action that occurs across this constraint when a row is deleted.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从父表中删除行时确定子表 （或表） 的列中将发生。When a row is deleted from a parent table, the determines what will happen in the columns of the child table (or tables). 如果此规则设置为`Cascade`，将删除子行。If the rule is set to `Cascade`, child rows will be deleted. 如果设置为`SetNull`、`DBnull`将放置在受影响的行的相应列。If set to `SetNull`, a `DBnull` will be placed in the appropriate columns of the affected rows. 具体取决于您的数据源，null 值可能会或可能不允许在列中。Depending on your data source, a null value may or may not be permitted in a column. 例如，SQLServer 允许多个 null 值位于主键列，即使它们不唯一。For example, SQLServer allows multiple null values to be found in a primary key column, even if they are not unique. 在中，但是，如果对象的属性设置为`true`，主键列中不允许多个 null 值。In a , however, if a object's property is set to `true`, multiple null values are not allowed in primary key columns. 如果设置为`SetDefault`，分配列的默认值。If set to `SetDefault`, the default value for the column is assigned. ## Examples 以下示例创建 ForeignKeyConstraint、 设置的各种属性，并将其添加到对象的。The following example creates a ForeignKeyConstraint, sets various of its properties, and adds it to a object's . [!code-vb[Classic WebData ForeignKeyConstraint.DeleteRule Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData ForeignKeyConstraint.DeleteRule Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
